entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
